News.headline: Help Support The Community Trust - Run4Life
News.page_title: Help Support The Community Trust - Run4Life
News.URL_keywords: Help Support The Community Trust - Run4Life
News.short_description: Help raise much needed funds for the Dagenham & Redbridge FC Community Trust
News.description:
Help raise funds for the Dagenham & Redbridge FC Community Trust by taking part in the Run4life 10k/5k Charity Event which will be hosted by Power House Community Network and held on the 9th April 2017.

The Dagenham and Redbridge Community Trust are a registered charity (charity number 1141511) who run a wide range of community projects to residents of Barking & Dagenham and surrounding areas.

All the funds raised will go directly to the Community Trust and will be used to support new and upcoming projects.

The run will start from the Football Club at 8am on the 9th April and all runners taking part in the Run4life will be asked to raise a minimum of Â£100.00.

If you have any other questions about the event please contact our Community Trust on: email - fitc@daggers.co.uk or phone - 0208 592 1549 ext. 30

If you would like to register for the event please click here.
